sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using LU decomposition
message_1:
Solve the system of linear equations using LU decomposition method:
$$
\begin{aligned}
x + 2y - 3z &= 1 \\
2x - y + z &= -2 \\
3x + y - 4z &= 0
\end{aligned}
$$
message_2:
To solve the given system of linear equations using LU decomposition, we first need to decompose the coefficient matrix A into a lower triangular matrix L and an upper triangular matrix U.

The given system of linear equations can be represented as:

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & -3 \\
2 & -1 & 1 \\
3 & 1 & -4
\end{bmatrix}
\begin{bmatrix}
x \\
y \\
z
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 \\
-2 \\
0
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Now, let's perform LU decomposition on matrix A:

$$
A = LU
$$

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & -3 \\
2 & -1 & 1 \\
3 & 1 & -4
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
l_{11} & 0 & 0 \\
l_{21} & l_{22} & 0 \\
l_{31} & l_{32} & l_{33}
\end{bmatrix}
\begin{bmatrix}
u_{11} & u_{12} & u_{13} \\
0 & u_{22} & u_{23} \\
0 & 0 & u_{33}
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Using the LU decomposition method, we find the L and U matrices as follows:

$$
L =
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 0 & 0 \\
2 & 1 & 0 \\
3 & 4 & 1
\end{bmatrix}
$$

$$
U =
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & -3 \\
0 & -5 & 7 \\
0 & 0 & 2
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Now, let's solve the system of linear equations using the L and U matrices:

1. Solve for the intermediate variable vector Y using forward substitution:

$$
LY = B
$$

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 0 & 0 \\
2 & 1 & 0 \\
3 & 4 & 1
\end{bmatrix}
\begin{bmatrix}
y_1 \\
y_2 \\
y_3
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 \\
-2 \\
0
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Solving for Y, we get:

$$
Y =
\begin{bmatrix}
1 \\
-4 \\
2
\end{bmatrix}
$$

2. Solve for the variable vector X using backward substitution:

$$
UX = Y
$$

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & -3 \\
0 & -5 & 7 \\
0 & 0 & 2
\end{bmatrix}
\begin{bmatrix}
x \\
y \\
z
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 \\
-4 \\
2
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Solving for X, we get:

$$
X =
\begin{bmatrix}
x \\
y \\
z
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
1 \\
2 \\
1
\end{bmatrix}
$$

So, the solution to the given system of linear equations is:

$$
x = 1, \quad y = 2, \quad z = 1
$$
